product_name: Komperdell Carbon Ultralight Compact V4 Women's Trekking Poles - Pair - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The Komperdell Carbon Ultralight Compact V4 Women's Trekking Poles fold down to an extremely small packed size. Their 100% carbon construction makes them strong incredibly lightweight for your treks. Poles fold down to 39cm for packing and telescope from 105 - 125 cm. Upper shafts feature Power Lock II lock mechanisms, offering easy and secure fixing with just a click. Lower shafts feature foldable Approach 1.0 mechanisms. EVA foam grips are heat-insulating and lighter weight than traditional grips; padded wrist straps offer a high level of comfort. Trekking basket/tip construction with pivoting ball mechanisms allow for optimal adjustment to any terrain. The Komperdell Carbon Ultralight Compact V4 Women's Trekking Poles feature tungsten carbide tips. Closeout.
short_description: The Komperdell Carbon Ultralight Compact V4 Women's Trekking Poles fold down to an extremely small packed size. Their 100% carbon construction makes them strong incredibly lightweight for your treks.
